update t_record set license_plate = #{licensePlate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, owner_name = #{ownerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, enter_time = #{enterTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, out_time = #{outTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, time_count = #{timeCount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, billing_price = #{billingPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, is_out = #{isOut,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, access_times = #{accessTimes,jdbcType=INTEGER}, delete_state = #{deleteState,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where source_id = #{sourceId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
